Name: SnowMound
Notes: A snow obstacle that can be destroyed with various player attacks, such as snowballs and fireballs.

Obj_arg0.Name: Number of Snowballs
Obj_arg0.Description: The number of snowballs that will appear when destroying it.

Obj_arg2.Name: Use Dead Tree?
Obj_arg2.Description: If set, a dead snow tree will appear once this object is destroyed.
